pages.text: These are the changes that were made to balance things in Spectralarity.

$(li)Removed several items that should be unobtainable from the Continuity Drop gift pool.$(li)Blacklisted Malum Impetuses from the Indestructible enchantment.$(li)Maximum RPM for Create components is now 512.$(li)Added stress impact to Create Rotation Speed Controllers.$(li)Create Mechanical Harvesters harvest partially-grown crops.
